name: aws-lambda-messenger
description: A sample messenger project based on AWS Lambda, which uses the ArrowStore library to access the DynamoDB

scripts.pack: npm run clean && tsc && copyfiles -f deploy/package.json build/
scripts.build: npm run pack && cd build && npm i && cd..
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd deploy && mkdir .aws && aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yml --output-template-file .aws/packaged.template.yml --s3-bucket triviaapp-dev-serverlessdeploymentbucket-1cuszpbeuol0z --region us-west-2 --profile arrow-store-integration & aws cloudformation deploy --template-file .aws/packaged.template.yml --stack-name arrow-store-sample-app --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region us-west-2 --profile arrow-store-integration && cd ..

author: Marat Sultangareev
